description: Try our easy to follow Affogato Al Caffe recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Affogato Al Caffe Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put 2 scoops of ice cream in each of 4 cappuccino cups or dessert bowls.
Pour a freshly made espresso coffee over each cup or bowl and serve immediately with biscotti, if liked.
For affogato al mocha, replace the vanilla ice cream with 8 scoops of rich, dark chocolate ice cream, pour over the coffee as above and top with 50g finely chopped plain dark chocolate.
